title: Week 2 NFL Picks, Best Bets (Football 9/15)
description:
On a football friday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco give you their picks for every game this weekend in the NFL against the spread starting with Bengals-Texans (9:38), then moving onto Jaguars-Titans (14:13), Ravens-Browns (18:40), Panthers-Bills (22:40), Patriots-Saints (25:00), Colts-Cardinals (29:00), Chiefs-Eagles (31:05), Steelers-Vikings (35:30), Bucs-Bears (37:30), Chargers-Dolphins (40:20), Raiders-Jets (42:50), Rams-Redskins (46:08), Broncos-Cowboys (50:50), Falcons-Packers (56:00), Giants-Lions (57:50).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
